PongApp - Class in application
The PongApp class launches the application
PongApp() - Constructor for class application.PongApp
 
PongGameController - Class in controller
The PongController class contains the main logic for controlling the pong gameplay
PongGameController(AnchorPane, Circle, Rectangle, Rectangle, Text, Text, AnchorPane, Text, Text, String, Button) - Constructor for class controller.PongGameController
The PongController constructor takes in a number of JavaFX objects which represent the pong game stage, paddles, ball, and user interface
It additionally instantiates key objects such as SecureRandom so as to randomly decide the starting direction of the ball
Finally, gameOn, the boolean value representing whether the game is running, is set to true
PongGameMessages - Class in view
The PongGameMessages class contains the dynamic messages displayed during game execution
PongGameMessages() - Constructor for class view.PongGameMessages
The default GameViewMessages constructor
pongGameView - Variable in class controller.AppController
 
pongGameView - Variable in class controller.PongMenuController
 
pongGameView - Variable in class controller.PreGameController
 
PongMenuController - Class in controller
The PongMenuController class contains the logic for handling the non-gameplay-related elements of the pong game, including the forfeit button, back to menu button, and play again button
PongMenuController(AnchorPane, AnchorPane, Button, Button, Button, PongGameController, PreGameController) - Constructor for class controller.PongMenuController
The PongMenuController constructor takes in the interactable UI elements from the pong game and instantiates those elements
PongMenuMessages - Class in view
The PongMenuMessages class contains the dynamic messages displayed in the pre-game menu
PongMenuMessages() - Constructor for class view.PongMenuMessages
The default PongMenuMessages constructor
PreGameController - Class in controller
The PreGameController class contains the logic for pre-game screen operations
PreGameController(AnchorPane, AnchorPane, AnchorPane, AnchorPane, AnchorPane, Button, Button, Text, Text, User, DataController, ArrayList<User>) - Constructor for class controller.PreGameController
The PreGameController constructor initiates all pane objects for the pre-game page, as well as instances of ArrayList of User, and DataController to manage saving of said ArrayList
